game.name: Streets of Rage Remake
game.desc: Streets of Rage Remake is a reworked version of the MegaDrive classic. You go through a huge city fighting against people who will attack you. There are over 60 different enemies, you can choose from 16 characters, select your favorite and wreak havoc. It's even better than the original. More characters, more levels, more action... Incredible. Plus, it's free!
